description: First floor rear extension to existing industrial unit warehouse (Retrospective Application)
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be in accordance with submitted drawing(s): Proposed Elevations U6CBC/005/P Rev: 02 30-07-2016, Proposed Plans U6CBC/004/P Rev: 02 30-07-2016.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within Section 9 of the submitted application form and the plans as listed in Condition (2).

REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2, 2.1 and 2.10, and policies 7.1, 7.2, 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2015).

| The office floorspace hereby approved shall only be occupied for ancillary Office and  storage purposes and shall not be used for any other purpose, including any other purpose within the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended), or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order, with or without modification.

Reason: To ensure the development is implemented in accordance with the permission sought and in the interests of protecting employment generating floorspace in accordance with policy 1.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy 2012.
